languages.text: {n}Гигант снисходительно улыбается, глядя на вас сверху вниз.{/n} "Не кипи, эттфатер. Если хочешь читать волшебные заговоры, взывая ко Всеотцу — разве я тебе запрещаю?" {n}Улыбка нехорошо кривится.{/n} "Но не бросайся столь дерзкими словами, иначе ответишь на них на поединке".

{n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."
languages.original_text: {n}Гигант снисходительно улыбается, глядя на вас сверху вниз.{/n} "Не кипи, эттфатер. Если хочешь читать волшебные заговоры, взывая ко Всеотцу — разве я тебе запрещаю?" {n}Улыбка нехорошо кривится.{/n} "Но не бросайся столь дерзкими словами, иначе ответишь на них на поединке".

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Thegin. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

{n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Thegin. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

{n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Thegin. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

{n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

languages.text: {n}El enorme Marine Espacial se ríe y te mira de arriba abajo.{/n} «Cálmese, Aett-Vater. Si quiere leer los encantamientos e invocar al Padre de todas las cosas, no seré yo quien le detenga». {n}La sonrisa de Ulfar se tuerce con malicia.{/n} «Pero contenga su osadía al hablar conmigo o tendremos que batirnos en duelo».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}El enorme Marine Espacial se ríe y te mira de arriba abajo.{/n} «Cálmese, Aett-Vater. Si quiere leer los encantamientos e invocar al Padre de todas las cosas, no seré yo quien le detenga». {n}La sonrisa de Ulfar se tuerce con malicia.{/n} «Pero contenga su osadía al hablar conmigo o tendremos que batirnos en duelo».

languages.text: {n}这位体格硕大星际战士哈哈大笑，上下打量着你。{/n}“冷静点，狼领。如果你打算念什么魔法咒语，把全父召唤出来，我不打算阻止你。”{n}乌尔法的笑容充满了恶意。{/n}“不过，不要对我口出狂言，否则你恐怕会在决斗中付出代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位体格硕大星际战士哈哈大笑，上下打量着你。{/n}“冷静点，狼领。如果你打算念什么魔法咒语，把全父召唤出来，我不打算阻止你。”{n}乌尔法的笑容充满了恶意。{/n}“不过，不要对我口出狂言，否则你恐怕会在决斗中付出代价。”

languages.text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンがあなたをまじまじと見て笑う。{/n}「落ち着け、アエット＝ヴァテル。魔法の呪文で全知の父を呼び起こしたいのであれば、俺はあんたを止めたりはしない」{n}ウルファーの笑みが悪意に歪む。{/n}「だが、俺に厚かましい言葉を吐き出すのはやめろ。さもなければ決闘でその代償を払うことになるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大なスペースマリーンがあなたをまじまじと見て笑う。{/n}「落ち着け、アエット＝ヴァテル。魔法の呪文で全知の父を呼び起こしたいのであれば、俺はあんたを止めたりはしない」{n}ウルファーの笑みが悪意に歪む。{/n}「だが、俺に厚かましい言葉を吐き出すのはやめろ。さもなければ決闘でその代償を払うことになるぞ」

languages.text: {n}L'immense Space Marine éclate de rire tout en vous dévisageant des pieds à la tête.{/n} « Détendez-vous, aett-vater. Si vous tenez à prononcer les formules magiques et à invoquer le Père de Tous, je ne vous en empêcherai pas. » {n}Son sourire se tord en un rictus malveillant.{/n} « Mais ne vous avisez pas de me provoquer, ou vous devrez m'en répondre les armes à la main. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'immense Space Marine éclate de rire tout en vous dévisageant des pieds à la tête.{/n} « Détendez-vous, aett-vater. Si vous tenez à prononcer les formules magiques et à invoquer le Père de Tous, je ne vous en empêcherai pas. » {n}Son sourire se tord en un rictus malveillant.{/n} « Mais ne vous avisez pas de me provoquer, ou vous devrez m'en répondre les armes à la main. »

languages.text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine lacht und mustert dich von oben bis unten.{/n} "Beruhigt Euch, Aett-Vater. Wenn Ihr die magischen Beschwörungen lesen und den Allvater anrufen wollt, werde ich Euch nicht aufhalten." {n}Ulfars Lächeln verzerrt sich bösartig.{/n} "Doch schleudert mir keine kühnen Worte entgegen, sonst werdet Ihr Euch in einem Duell dafür rechtfertigen müssen."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der riesige Space Marine lacht und mustert dich von oben bis unten.{/n} "Beruhigt Euch, Aett-Vater. Wenn Ihr die magischen Beschwörungen lesen und den Allvater anrufen wollt, werde ich Euch nicht aufhalten." {n}Ulfars Lächeln verzerrt sich bösartig.{/n} "Doch schleudert mir keine kühnen Worte entgegen, sonst werdet Ihr Euch in einem Duell dafür rechtfertigen müssen."

languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

languages.text: {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi seni boydan boya süzerek gülüyor.{/n} "Sakin ol Aett-Vater. Efsunlu sözler okuyup Yücebaba'yı uyandırmak istersen seni durdurmayacağım." {n}Ulfar'ın gülümsemesi fesatlaşıyor.{/n} "Fakat karşıma geçip pişkin sözler edersen cevabını çekişmede alırsın."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant Space Marine laughs, looking you up and down.{/n} "Simmer down, Aett-Vater. If you want to read the magic incantations and invoke the Allfather, I will not stop you." {n}Ulfar's smile twists with malice.{/n} "But do not spout brazen words at me or else you will answer for them in a duel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi seni boydan boya süzerek gülüyor.{/n} "Sakin ol Aett-Vater. Efsunlu sözler okuyup Yücebaba'yı uyandırmak istersen seni durdurmayacağım." {n}Ulfar'ın gülümsemesi fesatlaşıyor.{/n} "Fakat karşıma geçip pişkin sözler edersen cevabını düelloda alırsın."
